short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your writing is one of a kind.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cursive is your writing, verified. Track and analyze the writing you’re already going to do for class or fun. 

Once installed, Cursive securely tallies, logs, and stores your effort on supported sites giving you:
- Statistics, insight, and transparency
- Exclusive chances at contests, prizes, and discounts to local businesses
- Shareable replay pages to prove your effort
- A less invasive and free ‘proctoring’ environment for writing
- Peace of mind 

Your writing is one of a kind, beautiful, valuable, and, most importantly, yours. 

Extension User Rights
https://cursivetechnology.com/extension-user-rights/
